Package oop.quizzler.model

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
oop.quizzler.model.Connection
public class Connection extends Object
Class that represents a connection to the server.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Connection

      public Connection(String ip, int port)
      Establishes a connection to the server on call and sets the remoteInterface Object.
      Parameters:
      ip - ip address of the server
      port - port of the server

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public oop.quizzler.model.RemoteInterface getConnection()
      Establishes a connection to the server and returns the remoteInterface Object.
      Returns:
      Returns the remoteInterface Object.

    • getRemoteInterface

      public oop.quizzler.model.RemoteInterface getRemoteInterface()
      Returns:
      Returns the remoteInterface Object.

    • addQuizToServer

      public boolean addQuizToServer(oop.quizzler.model.Quiz newquiz)
      Adds a given new quiz to the server. Uses the remoteInterface Object
      Parameters:
      newquiz - The quiz to be added to the server.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the quiz was added successfully.

    • deleteQuizFromServer

      public boolean deleteQuizFromServer(String name)
      Deletes a quiz from the server. The quiz is identified by its name. Uses the remoteInterface Object.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the quiz to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the quiz was deleted successfully.

    • getQuizFromServer

      public oop.quizzler.model.Quiz getQuizFromServer(String name)
      Returns a quiz from the server. The quiz is identified by its name. Uses the remoteInterface Object.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the quiz to be returned.
      Returns:
      Returns the quiz with the given name.

    • getAllQuizNamesFromServer

      public String[] getAllQuizNamesFromServer()
      Returns:
      Returns all quiznames from the server in a String array.

    • addHighscore

      public void addHighscore(oop.quizzler.model.Attempt attempt, String name)
      Adds a highscore to the server. The highscore is located in the given attempt. The quiz is identified by its name.
      Parameters:
      attempt - The attempt that contains the highscore.
      name - The name of the quiz that the highscore is added to.

    • getIp

      public String getIp()
      Returns:
      Returns the IP address of the server.

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Returns:
      Returns the port of the server.
